div.p: Here the kbd element is used to indicate keys to press:
div.pre: To make George eat an apple, press Shift+F3
div.p: In this second example, the user is told to pick a particular menu item. The outer kbd element marks up a block of input, with the inner kbd elements representing each individual step of the input, and the samp elements inside them indicating that the steps are input based on something being displayed by the system, in this case menu labels:
div.pre: To make George eat an apple, select File|Eat Apple...
